effect_entries.effect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.
effect_entries.short_effect: Inflicts damage and removes any terrain present on the battlefield.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,
attacks the target with full force. This move negates
the effect on the battlefield.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Lycanroc,
attacks the target with full force. This move negates
the effect on the battlefield.
